roleset.name: put something under or beneath
roleset.note: UNDERLAY-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Member of Vncls 9.2. Roleset by Julia. (from underlay.01-v)

example.name: All args: theme as core arg, destination as oblique
example.text: I will underlay a screen shot of the flash movie under the flash movie.
example.arg: a screen shot of the flash movie

example.name: All args: destination as core, theme as oblique
example.text: The print-maker underlaid the plate with several sheets of paper to bring their surfaces into proper contact.
example.arg: to bring their surfaces into proper contact.
